## Functions

### ComputeLiveInBlocks() {#ab90f4a46f63bfddff132d20866be2da2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void ComputeLiveInBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; UsingBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DefBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; LiveInBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prediteratorcache">PredIteratorCache</a> &amp; PredCache)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given sets of UsingBlocks and DefBlocks, compute the set of LiveInBlocks.

This is basically a subgraph limited by DefBlocks and UsingBlocks.

Definition at line <a href="#l00086">86</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterbulk-cpp">SSAUpdaterBulk.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getUserBB() {#a1cef36d5650485966df368590e5abe4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BasicBlock &#42; getUserBB (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42; U)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Helper function for finding a block which should have a value for the given user.

For PHI-nodes this block is the corresponding predecessor, for other instructions it&#39;s their parent block.

Definition at line <a href="#l00029">29</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterbulk-cpp">SSAUpdaterBulk.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.Defines&#91;BB&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given sets of UsingBlocks and DefBlocks, compute the set of LiveInBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is basically a subgraph limited by DefBlocks and UsingBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="#ab90f4a46f63bfddff132d20866be2da2"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#ab90f4a46f63bfddff132d20866be2da2">ComputeLiveInBlocks</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;UsingBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;DefBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LiveInBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prediteratorcache">PredIteratorCache</a> &amp;PredCache) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To determine liveness, we must iterate through the predecessors of blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where the def is live.  Blocks are added to the worklist if we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check their predecessors.  Start with all the using blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 64&gt;</a> LiveInBlockWorklist(UsingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                    UsingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a7004354fbee1c8cd74ed9001915e1db5">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we have a set of blocks where the phi is live-in, recursively add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their predecessors until we find the full region the value is live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LiveInBlockWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = LiveInBlockWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The block really is live in here, insert it into the set.  If already in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the set, then it has already been processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LiveInBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(BB).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the value is live into BB, it is either defined in a predecessor or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// live into it to.  Add the preds to the worklist unless they are a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defining block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> : PredCache.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prediteratorcache/#aa4997ba4fd2495e1737dcf98457f8419">get</a>(BB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value is not live into a predecessor if it defines the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise it is, add to the worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LiveInBlockWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Perform all the necessary updates, including new PHI-nodes insertion and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// requested uses update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterbulk/#a60fac14032181eef9fe2f3e790ce9c28"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterbulk/#a60fac14032181eef9fe2f3e790ce9c28">SSAUpdaterBulk::RewriteAllUses</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;PHINode &#42;&gt;</a> &#42;InsertedPHIs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;R : Rewrites) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute locations for new phi-nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For that we need to initialize DefBlocks from definitions in R.Defines,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UsingBlocks from uses in R.Uses, then compute LiveInBlocks, and then use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this set for computing iterated dominance frontier (IDF).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The IDF blocks are the blocks where we need to insert new phi-nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9244cca1af4fa8be6df93278d8a191aa">ForwardIDFCalculator</a> IDF(&#42;DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SSAUpdater: rewriting &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; R.Uses.size()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; use(s)\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> DefBlocks;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DefBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(Def.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IDF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a9180c82ceffac7e5586cc2d6f368f996">setDefiningBlocks</a>(DefBlocks);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(FrontierBB, FrontierBB-&gt;begin());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreatePHI(R.Ty, 0, R.Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      R.Defines&#91;FrontierBB&#93; = PN;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill in arguments of the inserted PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PN : InsertedPHIsForVar) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PBB = PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PN-&gt;addIncoming(computeValueAt(Pred, R, DT), Pred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite actual uses with the inserted definitions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Use &#42;, 4&gt;</a> ProcessedUses;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;U : R.Uses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OldVal = U-&gt;get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OldVal &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid use!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Notify that users of the existing value that it is being replaced.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      U-&gt;set(V);</span></CodeLine>
